members.name: Hongbing
members.title: Master Student
members.bio: Research focus: Cognitive impairment recognition, Affective computing

members.name: Wentao Xiang
members.title: Leader
members.bio: Research focus: Physiological signal analysis, virtual reality rehabilitation technology, emotion recognition
members.introduction: Wentao Xiang is a professor at the School of Biomedical Engineering, Nanjing Medical University. He received his Ph.D. degree in Biomedical Engineering from the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China in 2010. His research interests include physiological signal analysis, virtual reality rehabilitation technology, and emotion recognition.
